programme.desc: Bimo actually has a trauma with Vespa because it reminds him of his ex-girlfriend who has passed away, but the Vespa girl like Donita managed to "break down" Bimo's heart. What did Donita do?

programme.title: ANAK BAND - EP 37
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: ART Elit Cari Pacar Syulit
programme.desc: Gia, a village girl, came to Jakarta because she won a lottery, but unfortunately, she was tricked; the address she went to was Evan's TV repair shop.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 375
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Actually Aku Tresno Kowe
programme.desc: Slamet is an OKB who migrates to Jakarta with his friend Sugeng to meet Siska. Slamet wants to experience something different from his life. Sugeng turns out to have a special task to ensure Slamet learns to live simply and earn money on his own. In Jakarta, Slamet becomes closer to Siska and makes Rico, a trendy kid from South Jakarta, look down on him. Rico often tries to embarrass Slamet with various challenges.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA - EP 50
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: Cinderela Gadungan Gak Pake Sepatu Kaca
programme.desc: Cinderella everywhere wears glass slippers, but this one wears boots, loves riding motorcycles, and is a tomboy too. RAISYA BAWAZIER doesn't care as long as she's happy. It's a different story with DIMAS ANGGARA, an artist with many fans who is really into RAISYA.

programme.title: Malam Puncak HUT SCTV 34 XtraOrdinary Part 1
programme.desc: The peak night of SCTV's 34th anniversary Xtraordinary was enlivened by Iwan Fals, Crash Adam, Rhoma Irama, Lesti, Maliq & D'Essential, Marion Jola, Padi Reborn, Raisa, JKT 48, Putri Ariani, Budi Doremi, Donne Maulana, Bilal Indrajaya, and also featured the cast of SCTV's soap operas who performed a musical drama. The 34th anniversary of SCTV was hosted by Ben Kasyafani, Raffi Ahmad, Ruben Onsu, and Astrid Tiar.

programme.title: Aiman Tempe Mania The Series - EP 9

programme.title: Dendam Cinta Arissa - EP 9

programme.title: Umar - EP 9
programme.desc: "Kehilangan" Umar adalah sebuah rancangan untuk merapatkan Firaz dan Damia. Akhirnya Firaz berani untuk menyatakan perasaannya kepada Damia.

programme.title: Umar - EP 10
programme.desc: Damia yang marah setelah rasa tertipu dan mengesyaki yang Firaz memiliki isteri lain diluar negara. Firaz memarahi Umar setelah mengetahui Umar adalah ‘mastermind’ dalam semua rancangan selama ini.

programme.title: Kampong Pisang Bersiri Siri - EP 1
programme.desc: Kg. Pisang menjadi kecoh dengan kes kecurian emas milik Barkoba. Lagi huru-hara air di Kg. Pisang turut dicatu! Adakah ini kerana unsur sabotaj atau misteri?

programme.title: Kampong Pisang Bersiri Siri - EP 2

programme.title: I Heart You Cik Yah
programme.desc: Zulkefli dan Badariah tidak sehaluan namun kerana ingin menyelamatkan kilang tempat mereka bekerja daripada ditutup oleh Qarina, mereka harus bekerjasama. Daripada benci timbul perasaan cinta.

programme.title: Fam ILY - EP 3

programme.title: Nadine Sierra Et Pretty Yende A La Philharmonie De Paris
programme.desc: Accompanied by the Frivolites parisiennes orchestra, conducted by Giacomo Sagripanti, sopranos Pretty Yende and Nadine Sierra, rising stars in lyrical arts, offer a sparkling and eclectic recital on the stage of the Philharmonie de Paris. Rossini, Verdi, Bellini, Massenet, Bernstein, Delibes, Gounod and Offenbach revisited!

programme.title: La Voie Royale
programme.desc: Farmers' daughter Sophie is a brilliant sixth-form student. Encouraged by her maths teacher she leaves the family farm for Lyon, to prepare for the Grandes Ecoles. She rapidly realises that her dream of attending the elite Polytechnique are less about passing an exam than the true challenge of social mobility...

programme.title: Les Mains Sales
programme.desc: The St Lawrence Valley, 1759. The daily life of Marie, a native slave in the service of a surgeon, is gloomy and alienating. Until the day she meets a little girl she assumes to be her child.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: La Vigne Est Belle - EP 5
programme.desc: It's time for the harvests and festivities as a family or among friends and colleagues. Everyone's happy at harvest time: at Pigeon Hill, Nival, L'Orpailleur, Bergeville, Negondos, Lieux Communs, Chateau de Cartes, St-Jacques and La Bauge, the vines are heavy with fruit.

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 2
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil - EP 895
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Pompon Ours - EP 17
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis - EP 45
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous ! - EP 18
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 49
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Droners - EP 2
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nui. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Api ! - EP 5
programme.desc: Api, worried about her friendship problems, can't keep up in class. When the teacher points it out, she starts crying in front of the whole class.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard - EP 49
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 35
programme.desc: Felix, Manolo and Lounis find a lottery ticket and think they've won the jackpot. After fighting over the prize, they realise they've only actually won five dollars.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou - EP 6
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Les Grandes Grandes Vacances - EP 8
programme.desc: Autumn 1943. The date of the armistice of the First World War is approaching. Resistance is growing in the village, and the inhabitants are increasingly committed to the cause. However, this demands great caution because not everybody sees things the same way.

programme.title: Matiere Grise - EP 6
programme.desc: The magazine programme which takes the mystery out of science, encouraging us to think... without all the brain work!

programme.title: Mission Apprentis - EP 6
programme.desc: In front of the cameras and within a limited time, six apprentices will have to take on a professional challenge and give their best to convince experts.

programme.title: Le Beau Velo De Ravel - EP 5
programme.desc: A bike journey, presented by Adrien Joveneau, along the entire RAVeL network, an independent cycle path network in Wallonia. With each programme, the presenter tells us of a stage in his journey and talks about mobility and tourist resources in the region.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera - EP 51
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: Waouh ! - EP 15
programme.desc: Nathalie Simon travels the French regions to meet extreme sports enthusiasts. Land, water, air: no matter their preferred playground, they share their passion and favourite places. They also offer a unique way to explore an area of the country. From high-level athletes to adrenaline junkies, there's emotion and excitement a-plenty!

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 3
programme.desc: Lourdes Pluvinage is the pioneer of Peruvian chefs. She came to France in 1988, drawn by a love story. She left Peru but brought the culinary flavours of her childhood with her and opened the first Peruvian restaurant in Paris: El Picaflor.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match - EP 48
programme.desc: She has one of the most impressive records in savate in France and internationally: French champion Chloe Nandi reflects on her career.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Pa T'mentir - EP 8
programme.desc: Colourism is the principle of creating a hierarchy depending on whether someone's skin tone is lighter or darker. The phenomenon, rife within all racially identified communities, is both real and taboo. Where does it come from and how can we put a stop to it?

programme.title: Serge A Paris - EP 8
programme.desc: Serge meets the singer Gregoire, who tells him about the creation of the song ''Toi + Moi''. We then follow him to the grand premiere of the musical ''Bernadette de Lourdes'', and his meeting with the likeable Belgian singer Axelle Red.

programme.title: Green - EP 1
programme.desc: We head to the heart of French Guiana, a territory where 97% of the land is covered by Amazonian forest. Antoine Auriol meets Philippe Lova Jah, Elvis, Mariana, Anais, Dave and Francisco, working to protect this natural treasure, and discovers the Kaw marshlands, veritable refuge for biodiversity.

programme.title: Tendance XXI - EP 8
programme.desc: Versailles: we visit Le Grand Controle, former residence of the king's finance minister, today a hotel. All about the history of the dinner jacket. With its roots anchored firmly in the glory of Napoleon's empire, Arthus Bertrand launches a jewellery collection. How to wear a ''nuisette'', the short French nightdress.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 5
programme.desc: Direction for to visit Rodin's home and studio. Ceramic artist Gregoire Scalabre sculpts and accumulates to enter another dimension, between tiny and gigantic. The John Galliano show for Maison Margiela: a journey through time and the strange. Artist Amandine Antunes masters the stucco marble technique.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Miracle Suisse
programme.desc: The programme that (finally) explains the ins and outs of Swiss well-being, and offers the keys to understanding that renowned ''Swiss attitude. A fun guide to Homo Helveticus, using archive footage from years past and recent times, all in a light-hearted, sunny mood with plenty of laughter thrown in.

programme.title: On Est Rendu La - EP 9
programme.desc: How important are religion and spirituality in today's world? Laura, Nabil and Maricielo show us a very different aspect of their faith and help to break certain cliches.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Monument Prefere Des Francais 2024
programme.desc: The French selected fourteen monuments from those put to the vote this year. Which monument will be their favourite? To present the viewers' rankings, Stephane Bern hosts us in an exceptional location: the Chateau de Rambouillet, in the French department of Yvelines, in the greater Paris region.

programme.title: Un Pere Ideal
programme.desc: Michel, the good-natured owner of the only cafe in a little Normandy village, sees his life turned upside down when his daughter is murdered. In a short space of time, he goes from ideal father to prime suspect. Jeff, the village priest, provides his only support. Michael is released due to lack of evidence and he struggles to rebuild his reputation.

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans - EP 20
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Ycare, Le Live
programme.desc: Versatile and self-taught, Ycare reveals the full extent of his talent in a brand new concert. A few guests join him on stage for a musical journey to the heart of his abundant repertoire, that of an artist who, through his singularity and open-mindedness, embodies accessible, popular and warm French music.

programme.title: Basique, Le Concert - EP 42
programme.desc: On the set of ''Basique,'' Stephan Eicher introduces us to some of his latest songs but also revisits his essential hits, giving them a new breath. Enough to offer a soaring and captivating show, with some surprises...

programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's

programme.title: En Plein Coeur
programme.desc: A young police cadet is found dead on the premises of the academy. His sister, also a student, refuses to believe he killed himself. Doubts confirmed by Inspector Anne Voreppe and Captain Chrystel Chesnot. Investigating amongst their own, in a police academy, means everyone is treading on eggshells...

programme.title: Sam & Julia - EP 50
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Droners - EP 3
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nui. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Api ! - EP 6
programme.desc: Eric brings a remote-controlled airplane to class and presents it to everyone. Fatou knows how to pilot it better than him. Mousse is jealous and Laeti is upset: she thinks Fatou is attracting all the attention.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard - EP 50
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule - EP 36
programme.desc: Flavie wants to organise a special evening in memory of Bouboule, Zoe's cat, to console her. But Felix has something else in mind and wants to organise a mega party.

programme.title: Koka Kitoumbou - EP 7
programme.desc: Malisha, age 10, accompanied by Rikitou, her little woollen doll, heads off for fabulous adventures in search of the Koka Kitoumbou stone. No ordinary stone, it has magical properties and amazing powers, notably that of turning whatever it touches into sweet treats.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald's
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie - EP 16
programme.desc: Discovery, in French, of bustling Ho Chi Minh City, which France continues to call Saigon. Gastronomy, architectural heritage, a century-old French school and the one and only French-speaking fair in the country are on the agenda of this stroll through the streets of the economic capital of Vietnam.

programme.title: Stoemp, Peket... Et Des Rawettes - EP 8
programme.desc: A veritable celebration of Belgium's regions, along with the locals who live there, their regional languages... and their humour!

programme.title: A Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: ''ABE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Les Belges Du Bout Du Monde - EP 8
programme.desc: Meeting with Martine Goffinet, who has created an artisanal cheese factory in Pietroso, Corsica. Active member of the eco-tourism network of Haute-Corse, she takes Adrien along the pond of Diane, on the mythical GR20 and to coves, to discover the local fauna and flora.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Secrets D'histoire - EP 1
programme.desc: He is the most famous gladiator of all time. Spartacus embodies rebellion, bravery and freedom, far more than a simple instrument of bloody entertainment. Genuine myth, he has passed through more than two thousand years of history. But who is he really?

programme.title: Echappees Belles - EP 28
programme.desc: From Madrid to the village of Consuegra, passing through the medieval city of Toledo, immerse yourself in the stunning beauty of Castilla-La Mancha. Explore this region, the third largest in Spain, proud of a heritage it continually revives.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Les Chefs ! - EP 7
programme.desc: Elliot, Jean-Christophe, Adrian and Andersen have just 20 minutes to prepare eggs Florentine.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Fort Boyard Et Les Cellules Interdites - EP 7
programme.desc: Elle's Imagine'nt welcomes and assists women who have suffered domestic violence in their legal proceedings and psychological reconstruction. Big Up Project provides financial support for food, clothing and education for orphans in Africa, particularly in Mali. With Frank Leboeuf, Hatik, enora Malagre, Elsa Esnoult, Mehdi Maizi.

programme.title: Villa Caprice
programme.desc: Luc Germon a well-known lawyer, thinks he's hit the big time when Gilles Fontaine, one of France's most powerful bosses, asks him to defend him in a fraud case. But a strange relationship soon develops between these two men, theoretically allies. Who'll come out on top?

programme.desc: A young man dreams of making a fortune in Chennai; he owns a travel agency and is all set to marry his lover. After he crosses paths with a loan shark, the latter is killed mysteriously. The young man runs for cover and plans to find the murderer.

programme.title: Movie - Maharani
programme.desc: A young man marries a beautiful woman but never tells her about his former girlfriend. As the couple settles into matrimony, his ex-lover makes a shocking return and complicates their relationship.

programme.title: ASO Cycling Programming 2025
programme.desc: Eschborn-Frankfurt is an annual semi classic cycling race in Germany, starting in Eschborn and finishing in Frankfurt. The event, sometimes referred to as the Frankfurt Grand Prix, is held annually on 1 May, national Labour Day in Germany. The event was first held on 1 May 1962. The race passes through the Taunus Hills west of Frankfurt, along a winding and hilly course with around 1500m (5,000 feet) of climbing.

programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. programme.title: WELCOME TO THE WEEKEND - FRI 15 AUG
programme.desc: Welcome to the Weekend returns for the 2025/26 season, and we're live in Liverpool ahead of Friday's opening game of the season. JJ, Olivia, Andrew and Ayo will bring you up to date with the freshest kits and biggest transfers from the summer that's been and give their predictions for the campaign ahead

programme.title: FANTASY SHOW - FRI 15 AUG
programme.desc: Haaland or Salah? Saka or Palmer? Isak or Cunha? Picking your Fantasy team is never easy, but the Fantasy Show is on hand to help FPL Managers with those big decisions.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 11
programme.desc: When Arne Slot guided Liverpool to their 20th League title in his debut season, it marked the beginning of a new era, yet echoed a familiar tradition. Explore the rich legacy of Liverpool's managerial transitions, where through decades of change, one constant endures: the club's remarkable ability to evolve and triumph, through seamless succession.

programme.title: PREMIER LEAGUE LIVE (Live)
programme.desc: The Premier League returns as the Champions Liverpool take on Bournemouth on what's set to be an emotional occasion at Anfield with the club displaying a special tribute to Diogo Jota before kick-off. Michael Owen, Steve McManaman and Jermain Defoe will join Steve Bower pitch-side at Anfield.

programme.title: Liverpool v Bournemouth (MW01) (Live)
programme.desc: Liverpool haven't lost their opening league game in any of the last 12 seasons (W9 D3), since a 3-0 loss at West Brom in 2012-13. It's the longest current run without defeat on MD1 of any Premier League side.

programme.title: PREMIER LEAGUE LIVE (Live)
programme.desc: Highlight match action from the Premier League's 2025/26 season.

programme.title: TEAM TALKS - FRI 15 AUG (Live)
programme.desc: Punditry, pressers and predictions ahead of the PL weekend. Our studio team tackle all the major talking points and we hear from the headline acts as the players and the managers have their say ahead of the action.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 1
programme.desc: After nine years at his boyhood club, this season is a new beginning for Sean Longstaff. This week on the Big Interview, Alex Aljoe sits down with Leeds United's new number eight to chat about his life and his summer move. The pair discuss his upbringing, his near decade spell on Tyneside culminating in an EFL Cup triumph, and the exciting project at Elland Road.

programme.title: PREVIEW - FRI 15 AUG (UPDATED)
programme.desc: The Premier League is back! We bring you highlights of Liverpool v Bournemouth, plus we preview the other nine opening day fixtures, with insights from Ruben Amorim and Mikel Arteta ahead of Manchester United v Arsenal.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS 25/26 MW01: Liverpool v Bournemouth
programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2025/26 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: TEAM TALKS - FRI 15 AUG
programme.desc: Punditry, pressers and predictions ahead of the PL weekend. Our studio team tackle all the major talking points and we hear from the headline acts as the players and the managers have their say ahead of the action.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 10
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 7
programme.desc: Widely regarded as the two best managers in Premier League history, Sir Alex Ferguson and Arsene Wenger went toe to toe on the touchline on numerous occasions over the years. But what made their rivalry so fierce? We take a look at the intense clashes, memorable moments on and off the pitch and the monumental impact their duels had on English football's modern era.

programme.title: PREVIEW - FRI 15 AUG (UPDATED)
programme.desc: The Premier League is back! We bring you highlights of Liverpool v Bournemouth, plus we preview the other nine opening day fixtures, with insights from Ruben Amorim and Mikel Arteta ahead of Manchester United v Arsenal.

The pair discuss his upbringing, his near decade spell on Tyneside culminating in an EFL Cup triumph, and the exciting project at Elland Road.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 11
programme.desc: When Arne Slot guided Liverpool to their 20th League title in his debut season, it marked the beginning of a new era, yet echoed a familiar tradition. Explore the rich legacy of Liverpool's managerial transitions, where through decades of change, one constant endures: the club's remarkable ability to evolve and triumph, through seamless succession.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS 25/26 MW01: Liverpool v Bournemouth
programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2025/26 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: TEAM TALKS - FRI 15 AUG
programme.desc: Punditry, pressers and predictions ahead of the PL weekend. Our studio team tackle all the major talking points and we hear from the headline acts as the players and the managers have their say ahead of the action.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 9
programme.desc: Newcastle United are a team on the rise under Eddie Howe; a manager quietly rewriting the modern history of the club. With exclusive access and interviews from inside St. James' Park, we uncover the transformation Howe has led, from stabilising the team to delivering silverware and reigniting belief on Tyneside. As the Magpies set their sights on even greater heights, we ask just how far he can take this ambitious, resurgent club.

programme.title: PREVIEW - FRI 15 AUG (UPDATED)
programme.desc: The Premier League is back! We bring you highlights of Liverpool v Bournemouth, plus we preview the other nine opening day fixtures, with insights from Ruben Amorim and Mikel Arteta ahead of Manchester United v Arsenal.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 10
programme.desc: We delve into the remarkable journey of Sunderland AFC; a club defined by its dramatic highs and painful lows. From their proud top-flight legacy to the heartbreak of consecutive relegations, Sunderland's story is one of resilience, identity, and unbreakable community spirit. Now, under the leadership of new head coach Regis Le Bris, the Black Cats are preparing for a new chapter.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 1
programme.desc: After nine years at his boyhood club, this season is a new beginning for Sean Longstaff. This week on the Big Interview, Alex Aljoe sits down with Leeds United's new number eight to chat about his life and his summer move. The pair discuss his upbringing, his near decade spell on Tyneside culminating in an EFL Cup triumph, and the exciting project at Elland Road.

programme.title: PREVIEW - FRI 15 AUG (UPDATED)

programme.title: PREMIER LEAGUE LIVE (Live)
programme.desc: The first Saturday of the new Premier League season kicks off with Aston Villa against Newcastle before Thomas Frank's first game in charge of Spurs sees him go up against Burnley in the feature clash on Goal Rush. Then, Manchester City's bid to regain the title starts away to Wolves in the late match.

programme.title: Aston Villa v Newcastle United (MW01) (Live)
programme.desc: Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last 21 home games in all competitions (W15 D6), winning the last eight in a row. It's their longest run without defeat at Villa Park since a run of 24 between September 1976 and May 1977.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur v Burnley (MW01) (Goal Rush) (Live)
programme.desc: Burnley didn't concede more than one goal in any of their 46 league games last season. However, in the Premier League they're without a clean sheet in 20 games since a 2-0 win at Fulham in December 2023.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers v Manchester City (MW01) (Live)
programme.desc: Man City have won their opening league game in 13 of the last 14 seasons, with the exception being a 1-0 loss at Tottenham Hotspur in 2021-22.

programme.desc: Highlight match action from the Premier League's 2025/26 season.

programme.title: PREMIER LEAGUE LIVE (Live)
programme.desc: The headline clash of the opening weekend sees Manchester United take on Arsenal in Sunday's late game with the likes of Viktor Gyokeres being one of multiple new signings on show. Before that, Club World Cup Champions Chelsea face FA Cup winners Crystal Palace.

programme.title: Chelsea v Crystal Palace (MW01) (Live)
programme.desc: Chelsea are unbeaten in their last 15 Premier League games against Crystal Palace (W13 D2), their longest active run against any of the 19 other sides involved in the 2025-26 season.

programme.title: Manchester United v Arsenal (MW01) (Live)
programme.desc: This is just the second time in English league history Manchester United are hosting Arsenal in their first game of the season, previously beating the Gunners 4-1 in 1989-90.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Bournemouth (MW01) (Live) - EP 1
programme.desc: Liverpool haven’t lost their opening league game in any of the last 12 seasons (W9 D3), since a 3-0 loss at West Brom in 2012-13. It’s the longest current run without defeat on MD1 of any Premier League side.

programme.desc: As the excitement and anticipation builds ahead of the new Premier League campaign, get a detailed overview of how all 20 clubs are set - offering insight and analysis on new signings, newly promoted teams and much, much more. programme.desc: Sunderland are winless in their last eight league games against West Ham (D4 L4), most recently a 2-2 draw in April 2017.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Burnley (MW01) - EP 5
programme.desc: Burnley didn’t concede more than one goal in any of their 46 league games last season. However, in the Premier League they’re without a clean sheet in 20 games since a 2-0 win at Fulham in December 2023.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Manchester City (MW01) - EP 6
programme.desc: Man City have won their opening league game in 13 of the last 14 seasons, with the exception being a 1-0 loss at Tottenham Hotspur in 2021-22.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Brentford (MW01) (Live) - EP 8
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest have won just one of their last eight league games against Brentford (D3 L4), a 2-0 away win in December last season.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26 - EP 1
programme.desc: After nine years at his boyhood club, this season is a new beginning for Sean Longstaff. This week on the Big Interview, Alex Aljoe sits down with Leeds United’s new number eight to chat about his life and his summer move. The pair discuss his upbringing, his near decade spell on Tyneside culminating in an EFL Cup triumph, and the exciting project at Elland Road.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Arsenal (MW01) (Live) - EP 9
programme.desc: This is just the second time in English league history Manchester United are hosting Arsenal in their first game of the season, previously beating the Gunners 4-1 in 1989-90.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus du Plessis vs. Martin Van Staden
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts headlined by a welterweight title fight between Dricus du Plessis and Martin Van Staden. Bonus coverage includes a lightweight battle between Mthobisi Buthelezi and Luke Michael and a bantamweight clash between Bill Thusi and Tjaart Henning.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Miguel Rodriguez
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features undefeated Andre Berto (21-0, 18 KOs) battling Miguel Angel Rodriguez, aka 'Miki', (29-2, 23 KOs)i for the vacant WBC Welterweight Title from the FedEx Forum in Memphis, Tennessee, USA on June 21, 2008. Bonus coverage includes Chris 'The Nightmare' Arreola (23-0, 21 KOs) vs. Chazz Witherspoon (23-0, 15 KOs).

programme.title: Mega Fights In 60 Joel Julio vs.James Kirkland
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a Super Welterweight, 10 Round contest featuring Joel Julio (34-2, 31 KOs) vs.undefeated James Kirkland, aka 'Mandingo Warrior' (24-0, 21 KOs) from the HP Pavilion in San Jose, California, USA on March 3, 2009.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 11: Bangkok, Thailand - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Muay Thai and Martial Art of Punches, Kicks, Elbows and Knees with Masters Thakoon Pongsupha and Karim Pattana.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Ricky Hatton
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather, Jr., in the final bout before his first retirement from boxing, facing Ricky Hatton in a superfight. Mayweather has referred to Hatton as one of the toughest competitors he has ever had to face. Also on the card, a young Saul (Canelo) Alvarez continues to rise in the rankings.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Episode 5 from Dolphins Arena in Nagoya, Japan features Hakuho, Ichinojo, Terunofuji and Takanosho.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.desc: World Title challenger Jayson 'Smasher' Mama of the Philippines is set to enter hostile territory as he challenges IBO Super Flyweight World Champion Ricardo Malajika in his home country of South Africa. programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 90
programme.desc: Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po are trying very hard not to make any noise. Then they make as much noise as possible during the Tubby Phone Dance.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) - EP 10
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'bubble' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different bubbles - big bubbles, tiny bubbles, shiny bubbles and even bouncing bubbles!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 49
programme.desc: On today's poptastic adventure, the friends are going to a waterpark!But when Zip gets nervous about riding the slides, will he tell his friends how he feels?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: Messy and his friends are joined by a group of robots when they build a bridge. Stan Tall puts it to the test.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 11
programme.desc: Dad agrees to play Sheepdog with Bluey and Bingo to stop them from disturbing Mum who is taking a well-earned rest, but looking after a sheep is harder work than they expected.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 10
programme.desc: Dad tries to teach Bluey how to play chess, but Mum thinks she is still too young. When Bingo joins in, the kids make up their own rules, but they still can't beat Dad.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 10
programme.desc: Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 9
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 26
programme.desc: Glitch offends some nomads in Mongolia, so it's down to the Go Jetters to take the reins.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 22
programme.desc: Packing for the pool, Bluey and Dad tease Mum about being so fussy with what to take. But when they arrive underprepared, they realise a little planning goes a long way.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: Bluey, Bingo, Mum and Dad play a game of hand puppets, exploring the land beyond the Blue Mountains where they outsmart the Cheeky Fox to find the softest ever beds.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 4
programme.desc: In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to the Pacific ocean, off the tropical islands of Hawaii, on a baby animal mission to see how a baby humpback whale prepares for its 5000 km migration North to the rich feeding grounds of Alaska.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S2) - EP 10
programme.desc: When a mountain biker called Eddie fails to come back from a ride with his friends, Dan and Jamie are called out on a night search.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild (S2) - EP 10
programme.desc: This episode features the Tapir and the Fruit Bat - their wild connection is they are super seed spreaders.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 20
programme.desc: Captain Captain's Uncle Joe King is coming to visit. Uncle Joe is the best joker in the family and Captain Captain has got a big plan to play a joke on him!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 24
programme.desc: The Squirrels hear a strange sound that they've not heard before, so they ask Duggee to help identify it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 23
programme.desc: The Squirrels become enchanted when they hear a piece of music from Duggee's choir. They quickly learn what makes a choir.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Squirrels notice that Happy isn't acting like his normal self, and he's strangely wearing new trainers. Happy doesn't know what he's feeling, and his friends want to help him.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 2
programme.desc: Glitch gets into a mountain of trouble as the Go Jetters attempt to climb the Matterhorn.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: Can the Go Jetters rescue the ancient city of Petra when Glitch causes in an earthquake?

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 22
programme.desc: Amidst Italy's ancient sites and hidden treasures, Thomas is inspired to make his own special discovery and goes on a journey to find a lost legend.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 36
programme.desc: Stanley is called to pose as a model for the town's art club, but he's got lots of jobs on and won't stay still. Peggy and the gang must come up with a way to keep Stanley still.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 35
programme.desc: Stanley helps Seamus and Little Woo reconstruct the Big Wheel from Seamus' childhood. This is more difficult than Stanley thought it would be as it needs a clean and an upgrade.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 41
programme.desc: Monty and Stan refuse to taste a strange-looking fruit, but Monty soon realises that you shouldn't judge a book by its cover.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) - EP 30
programme.desc: When Mummy's at work, JoJo asks what a job is. While Gran Gran explains, they realise Mummy accidentally took Gran Gran's phone! Now JoJo's job is visiting Mummy to fix the mix-up!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 6
programme.desc: When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 7
programme.desc: Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 8
programme.desc: Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 26
programme.desc: Norrie is running late to Squirrel Club, so Duggee teaches the squirrels what a commute is - a journey that can take you from home to learn, work or play.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 25
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee reading about wise animals and wish to learn more about what it means to be wise.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S2) - EP 26
programme.desc: Glitch offends some nomads in Mongolia, so it's down to the Go Jetters to take the reins.

programme.desc: Two peas perform a happy song.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 19
programme.desc: Lemon performs a stand-up routine!

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 49
programme.desc: Carrot is determined to save Supertato from Evil Pea's trap without help from Prickly Pear

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 50
programme.desc: Broccoli is horrified when someone paints moustaches on photographs of her friends!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 24

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot "Qilin" and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season_x000D_1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

But the suit gets stuck shut, leaving the excitable children wondering where their artefacts are!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 - EP 21
programme.desc: In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 49
programme.desc: With the Baby Corp babies exiled from their office and hiding in the Templeton basement, Boss and a trusted team storm Baby Corp to take it back from the villains. Having decided to retire and pass the CEO-ship onto to Staci, he also prepares Tim for her new life as an older brother to just a normal baby brother.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 53
programme.desc: After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along - they’re so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert - but magical - chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up - and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless "Heart of Fire Ruby" a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: Offsiders (2025) - EP 28
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi and the panel Gideon Haigh, Marnie Vinall and Sam Wykes discuss the start of the AFLW season, the Wallabies tour of South Africa, the Australia-South Africa T20 series against and the latest rugby league news.

programme.title: ABC Late News (2025) - EP 66
programme.desc: Live across Australia, the latest headlines and the day's top stories from ABC News. We have reporters on the ground connecting communities, telling your stories and bringing you coverage of what's happening as it unfolds.

programme.title: Compass S39 - EP 19
programme.desc: How do we resist the growing influence of Big Tech over our lives? Nobel Peace Prize winner Maria Ressa and Australian commentator and influencer Hannah Ferguson are tackling this question head on.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight (2025) - EP 66

programme.title: Pacific Break Live from Samoa 2025: S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Pacific Break returns in 2025 with a special concert in Samoa.

programme.title: Black Snow S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: Billy Hopkins' dies in a motorbike crash just hours before he was due to meet with Cormack. Cormack suspects foul play. He thinks that Billy's death, the missing workers and Isabel's murder could all be connected.

programme.desc: Mallacoota made international headlines during the bushfire crisis when the sky above it turned red. The town is now leading the way in bushfire recovery - opting to do it all themselves - rather than rely on government.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 7
programme.desc: Alec’s first date with Rose turns into a 24-hour excursion when they find themselves taking on an investigation involving a forged masterpiece. Marisa and Kylie attempt to revive their friendship, which has faltered since Alec and Marisa’s divorce.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 8
programme.desc: Alec takes a case involving a young burn victim and arson that forces him to confront some trauma from his past. Phoebe and Rizwan compete for an important research grant.

programme.desc: After witnessing a hit and run during a friend’s livestream, Alec and Kylie aim to prove it wasn’t an accident. As Marisa and Jace continue their investigation into the church bombing, they turn their sights on a prominent senator.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 10
programme.desc: Alec and his team come face to face with the man who was put away for the church bombing 20 years earlier. Marisa and Kylie work together to save Alec, Phoebe and Rizwan. Jace makes a critical break in the case that changes everything.

programme.title: The Irrational - EP 11
programme.desc: Alec and Marisa follow clues leading to the bomber behind the church explosion. Kylie secures an FBI interview but her knowledge makes her an asset. Phoebe and Rizwan uncover evidence revealing the truth.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime

Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Fast Money
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Who Owns...?

programme.title: Us Fast Money (recorded) 2025

programme.title: Inside Track: The Business Of Formula 1
programme.desc: Formula 1 is the world’s most elite motorsports league with 10 teams, 20 drivers and races that span the globe. CNBC follows the money to find out what fuels its rapid growth and popularity.

programme.title: Cnbc Sport: On The Record
programme.desc: CNBC Sport: On The Record explores the convergence of sports, business, and investing. Each week, we sit down with the biggest names in sports - from league commissioners, team owners, influential media executives and top athletes - to give you an insider's perspective on the strategies, deals, and stories shaping sports and business.

programme.title: Channel Japan 2025/26
programme.desc: Channel Japan offers a fresh look at the latest in the economy, business, technology, culture and sightseeing of Japan.

programme.title: American Greed S1-15
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich. Their complex scams leave victim's lives in shambles. Each episode is a deep dive into the minds and actions of heartless crooks who live lives most people can only dream of.

programme.title: Pga Tour 2025
programme.desc: Golfing highlights from last weekend's PGA TOUR tournament.

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship 2025
programme.desc: The WDSC is the world-leading international series for the spectacular sporting disciplines of Downhill Skateboarding and Street Luge in their purest forms.

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship 2025
programme.desc: The WDSC is the world-leading international series for the spectacular sporting disciplines of Downhill Skateboarding and Street Luge in their purest forms.

programme.title: Arctic Race Of Norway 2025/2026
programme.desc: The Arctic Race of Norway (ARN) is a four-day road race held every year in August in Northern Norway’s magnificent scenery. Created in 2013, the event is now established as Scandinavia’s main international cycling event, and one of Norway’s most important sports events, and is part of the UCI ProSeries, the second highest division of cycling races. Each year, several Tour de France teams and some of the world’s greatest cycling stars participate in the ARN and fight for the race’s iconic prizes.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2025
programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. It is hosted by Emmy Award-winning writer and one of the 2014 TIME 100, Time magazine’s 100 most influential people, Seth Meyers. Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the show’s wildly popular "Weekend Update."

programme.desc: With the promise of unimaginable computing power, a global race for quantum supremacy is raging. Who will be first to harness this new technological force, and what will they do with it?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

It combines high-end production with editorial values that brand the show’s demand to be different.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Assignment Asia
programme.desc: Assignment Asia is a current affairs program that takes an in-depth look at stories from all over Asia. The show focuses on people. It puts the spotlight on issues affecting the region through interviews with and first-person accounts of ordinary people with extraordinary stories.

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and "accepted wisdom" to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, the Agenda quite simply sets the agenda. You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling. The program provides a unique platform for the best current affairs documentaries from around the globe. Big Story aims to present the contemporary world and China’s global perspectives on the contemporary world to an international audience.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group’s new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The story comically portrays, through songs and tears, how these two women in their 70s gain freedom, carve out a new life, and pass hope on to the younger generation.

programme.desc: Let’s look into the world of Ukiyoe to learn how people lived in Edo period!

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news from Tokyo.

programme.title: NHK Amateur Singing Contest "Uruma City, Okinawa Prefecture"
programme.desc: A very popular live program on a Sunday afternoon held at different towns and cities around Japan. Guest singers will also join in for support.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: Mrs. GREEN APPLE: 10th Anniversary Special Live Complete Edition
programme.desc: A special program celebrating the 10th anniversary of Mrs. GREEN APPLE's debut. Performing a rich selection of songs, from their early works to their latest, including songs making their television debut. Also includes a special talk with Uchimura Teruyoshi.

programme.title: Gretel's Magical Oven (R)
programme.desc: Each week, a particular sweet and its recipe will be introduced along with various topics about the sweet.

programme.title: Climbing the Mysterious Icefall
programme.desc: Special programs ranging from entertainment shows to documentaries will be shown.

programme.title: Drama 80 Years After the War "The Man who Carries the Voices of August" (R)
programme.desc: Based on the true story of journalist Ito Akihiko, who lived in Nagasaki and traveled across Japan collecting the voices of atomic bomb survivors, this drama portrays a fateful encounter shaped by the tragedy of the bombing. Written by Ikehata Shunsaku, who grew up in Hiroshima, and starring Motoki Masahiro, the drama amplifies the voices of survivors who continue to share their experiences, 80 years after the atomic bombings.

programme.title: With Father
programme.desc: A children's program comprised of fun stories, songs as well as gymnastic exercises which can be enjoyed together with fathers.

programme.title: News (B)
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news from Tokyo.

programme.title: The Visualization Entertainment: Go! Kaneo-kun
programme.desc: The show is MC-ed by comedian Ariyoshi Hiroiki, who hosts an NHK program on a regular basis for the first time. The mascot character "Kaneo-kun" (voice of Nobu, of comedy duo Chidori), who loves money, visits various places, including popular visiting locations, and looks into different phenomena to learn how money plays a role. The undertaking help unravel unexpected trends in society. The program, which can be enjoyed by every member of the family, offers much food for thought.

programme.title: Nosy's Inspiring Atelier
programme.desc: Curious fairies "Nosy" create unique works using their imaginations, inspired by interesting phenomena and materials they found in the world of humans. Let’s express your idea through creation with Nosy, as you think and explore.

programme.title: World Weather
programme.desc: Weather information of the different areas around the world.

programme.title: NHK News 7 (B)
programme.desc: NHK's core news program wrapping up the day's events in an easy to understand way.

programme.title: Darwin's Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Rarely seen. Up-close with some of the planet's most amazing animals. Enter a world of unique creatures from Asia, Africa and the Americas.

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 31
programme.desc: The story depicts the turbulent life of Tsutaya Juzaburo (Yokohama Ryusei), known as "Tsutaju", a man who laid the foundation for Japan’s media industry and pop culture. Despite the close scrutiny of the shogunate, he relentlessly pursued humor and entertainment. This thrilling drama is filled with laughter, tears, and mystery.

programme.title: News & Weather
programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: NHK Special "Simulation: Defeat in the Summer of 1941" Part 2
programme.desc: A documentary based on timely subjects famous for its dignity and in-depth reporting.

programme.title: Premium Drama "TERUKO & LUI" Eps. 6
programme.desc: Teruko (Fubuki Jun) goes for a drive with her best friend Rui (Natsuki Mari). It seems like a joyful trip, but in truth, it's a desperate escape. They start living in a villa in Yatsugatake, hiding their true identities. The story comically portrays, through songs and tears, how these two women in their 70s gain freedom, carve out a new life, and pass hope on to the younger generation.

programme.desc: The latest up-to-date news and nationwide weather information.

programme.title: On the Wings 5min.
programme.desc: Soar over the silvery snow-clad expanses of northern Japan where the majestic Japanese Alps rise to greet you.

programme.title: Frontrunners
programme.desc: Fukuoka's summer festival Hakata Gion Yamakasa features huge floats decorated with elaborate dolls - we meet Nakamura Hiromine, a fourth-generation doll maker fusing this tradition with modern ideas.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: My Street Piano
programme.desc: Tokyo's Arakawa Ward has a shopping street with over 100 years of history. There sits a piano, which passersby love to visit and play from the heart.

programme.title: Repairing a Post-Quake Community
programme.desc: Kintsugi mends broken pottery with gold - an artist is restoring earthenware damaged by the Noto earthquake and helping residents put the pieces of their lives back together too.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Biz Stream Special Edition
programme.desc: Buddhist temples and Shinto shrines in rural areas are trying to remain relevant by offering new services to meet the daily needs of residents.

programme.title: One in Every Japanese
programme.desc: 1 in 156 Japanese are transgender - in a society still lacking in understanding, we talk to transgender people about work, marriage and leisure as they try to live their normal daily lives.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Hara Kazuo is the first person from Asia to win the Golden Ring Special Edition prize at an Italian film festival that explores the dark side of movies - he talks about his vision for documentaries.

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Taimatsu Akashi honours those who died defending the castle at Sukagawa in 1589 - local people form teams to make huge torches that are set alight in a hilltop park to commemorate the fallen warriors.

programme.title: Ukiyo-e Edo-Life
programme.desc: A Fashion Night: Fireworks lit up the skies practically every summer's night for a time during the Edo period; it was a chance for women to dress up, let loose, and grab the attention of male suitors.

programme.title: Medical Frontiers
programme.desc: Rectal cancer is increasing among younger people - depending on the stage, a stoma may be needed. We report on efforts to preserve the anus using robotic-assisted surgery and artificial intelligence.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: Journey to the great northern land of Japan: Hokkaido. Its scenery changes dramatically throughout the year. Witness the beauty of Hokkaido through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about risshu and shosho, two dates of early autumn. The temple chefs show us how to prepare dishes using winter melon and share their recipe for a Japanese-style ratatouille.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Higashinada Danjiri involves a parade of decorated floats, pulled by teams of veterans and ridden by young performers that lean out over the crowd. 32 districts take part with their own float.

programme.title: Passing the Torch of Peace
programme.desc: A-bomb survivor trees are treasured in Hiroshima - one cherry tree in a schoolyard has forged a bond with a former student and brought her hope and enduring joy after the bombing.

programme.title: Somewhere Street

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey

programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: The Sound Of Talents
programme.desc: TVB's all-new large-scale singing competition aims to discover the next generation of music stars, targeting passionate and talented individuals aged 16 to 30 from around the world.

programme.title: A Date with Goddess
programme.desc: This groundbreaking reality show sees five goddess-level female artistes being matched with men from all over the world!

programme.title: Enjoy the Music Tonight
programme.desc: Celebrating classic and contemporary Cantonese pop music, each episode of this show features well-known singers and guests who perform live renditions of beloved hits and share behind-the-scenes stories from their musical journeys.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Shock Mystery
programme.desc: This show documents strange happenings from all over the world, all of which cannot be explained from a point of view accepted by ordinary people. Explore incredible mysteries that not only existed in the past, but still exist today!

programme.title: The Longest Day in Chang'an - EP 2
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: Young Lady and Gentleman - EP 41
programme.desc: A spirited young woman with a big heart becomes the new live-in tutor for a wealthy household grieving a recent loss, a romance blooms between the two of them.

programme.title: Serendipity - EP 2
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Jian Mingshu (Lu Yuxiao) loses her memory after falling off a cliff, which saves her from a massacre. Rescued by her love interest Lu Chang (Wang Ziqi), they journey to the capital for imperial exams. Facing challenges together, they fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2017
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Anonymous Signal - EP 14
programme.desc: Three police rookies and a senior develop a tight relationship until they parted ways due to an operation. Mysterious text messages that can't be scientifically explained are being sent to them following a dismemberment murder of a young girl. Who sent them?

programme.title: The Prisoner of Beauty - EP 25
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Xiao Qiao (Song Zuer) and Wei Shao (Liu Yuning) enter into a political marriage and gradually develop feelings for each other. Together, they unite their efforts to protect their country while building a harmonious family.

programme.desc: A former Taekwondo athlete, who is permanently banned from the national team, becomes a mental coach to help players in slump, heal retired athletes and engage a real match against the absurd world of winner-take-all.

programme.title: Evilive - EP 4
programme.desc: The series tells the story of a struggling lawyer Han Dong Soo (Shin Ha Kyun) who gets cases by recklessly visiting prisoners. He meets an absolute villain and transforms into an elite villain himself.

programme.title: Breaking the Shadows - EP 17
programme.desc: Summer 2017, a rain-soaked southern town is rocked by the discovery of dismembered remains. Officer Han Qing (Sun Li) investigates while searching for her missing partner, Zhong Wei (Luo Jin). As the case unfolds, a major drug trafficking operation unveils.

programme.title: Their Wonderful Time - EP 1
programme.desc: When female game designer Song Ling Ling (Zhou Jie Qiong) unexpectedly becomes possessed by the NPC she had created, she finds herself in a comical cohabitation with 'the client', Xiao Ran (Ge Qiu Gu).

programme.title: Police Station No. 7 - EP 20
programme.desc: WONG YING KOO (SIT KA YIN, NANCY), a jovial optimistic middle-aged woman, is always ready to offer help to others in need. She lives happily with her daughter SUEN MAN WAH (WANG, IRENE) and other members of her family. She is a good friend of her neighbour WONG CHI CHEUNG (HUI SHIU HUNG), whose son WONG KIM (NG KAI WAH, LAWRENCE) respects her and regards her as his own mother. Corruption is a major social problem of the time in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Angels of Missio - EP 4
programme.desc: The Police Counter-Terrorism Unit (CTU) gathers intelligence to fight against terrorist attacks. Three beautiful female officers, SAM (KWOK SONIJA), FA (SHEH CHARMAINE) and BO BO (YEUNG SZE KI, SHIRLEY), who have different personalities, are outstanding members of this unit._x000D_ _x000D_ SAM is a Chief Inspector in CTU. She is decisive and never mixes personal matters with work. FA is good at martial arts and enthusiastic in her job. However, she can be very short-tempered.

programme.title: Brutally Young 2.0 - EP 5
programme.desc: Since starting out more than a decade ago, painter Yiu Sheung-him (Shaun Tam) has not much luck until gallery boss Fong Chi-ho (Joel Chan) and his wife Sung Wai-kei (Candice Chiu) discover an old painting created by Sheung-him 18 years ago. And the couple decide to help him become famous, but Sheung-him is simply not in the mood to feel happy. A moment of vanity causes Sheung-him to forgo his principles which he has been steadfastly following.

programme.title: Kung Fu Master From Guangdong - EP 10
programme.desc: The tale aims at revealing the Kung fu Master WONG KI YING’s life and his righteous character. YING and his colleagues are respected as the "Ten Tigers of Guangdong". The tale is played by Wong Yat Wa, Felix, Leung Tsang, Jay, Lau Kam Ling, Kwok Jing Hung and Kung Fu Masters from the Mainland China. The tale is shot at Yunan Kunming. Audiences will be astonished by the stylish fighting and special landscapes. One will be deeply impressed by it.

programme.title: Golden Faith - EP 38
programme.desc: BEN (LAW KA LEUNG, GALLEN) meets NAM (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) in Australia during a business trip. When he gets back to Hong Kong, he is involved in a robbery and NAM is in charge of prosecution._x000D__x000D_ BEN’s parents died in a ship accident when he was six. His brother was never found. BEN was saved by BON (CHUN PUI). BON treats him like his own son and passes his gold shop business to him.

programme.title: Golden Faith - EP 39
